basicInfo.name: Sieg
basicInfo.flavor: \"One time, this thing went TOTALLY HAYWIRE! I had to beat it to calm it down. Hahaha...\

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Devastating Blow
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 375% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Damage Reduction [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Damage Reduction to 23%.

Skill 2.name: Unleashed Blade
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 545% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 25% of the caster's Physical Attack.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 655% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 30% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Passive.name: Stalwart Ally
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Stun Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Stun Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Back Row Allies
 - Grants Physical Attack Boost. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Physical Attack Boost upon using any attack 2 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Attack Boost to 27%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Turns: Physical Attack Boost duration becomes 3 turn(s).

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Members of the Holy Cross Crusaders, Orly, Aquila, barbeques, exercise, training
profile.dislikes: Bai Jiao, Dellons, demons, cowardice, giving up, suppression, forceful commands
